name: The Bedtime Story
description: It's almost 3 AM, dead time, with no teddy bear in sight. Is the house really this big? Or is it just the way the boogeyman's shadows creep through the halls... Teddy, where are you? Find out by playing The Bedtime Story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i-3 Series Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i-7 Series Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 900 series or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
